ComicInfo.Summary:
How to sacrifice a black cat
Childhood modesty shredded
Mickey Rat wins the lottery
Surf teenager Angie wants to experience the wider world
A meat fetish
Aline's late-flourishing attraction to men
Mr. Simms shakes off his catatonia
A bad acid experience.
A visit to a flagellant cult.
Big Bitch comes across a strange religious town
Hopes for the progression of humanity
